Note : The turret will search for targets in a 180 degree arc facing *you* when you place it. Requires 10 power.

description: A basic warming tea that temporarily increases both your core and minimum temperature.

description: A clipping of a Blue Berry Plant.

description: These blue berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.

description: Trousers made out of burlap.

description: Burned Deer Meat. Eating it will damage your health.

description: Burned horse meat. Eating it will damage your health.

name: Caboose

name: Charcoal

name: Chicken Pie

name: Chinese Lantern
description: A decorative Paper lantern

name: Chinese Lantern White
description: A decorative White Paper lantern

name: Chippy Arcade Game
description: An Arcade Machine

description: Chocolate Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Christmas Lights
description: A string of colored lights to decorate your home

name: Christmas Tree
description: Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative Christmas tree

name: Circle Balloon
description: A circular balloon to use as decoration and for you to celebrate. You can write on it.

name: Clan Table
description: A table for managing clans.

description: Special helmet for players who own Clatter and have played for at least 30 minutes, replaces the bucket helmet.

description: A clump of mixed balloons to use as decoration and for you to celebrate.

description: Crappy Holidays!

name: Confetti Cannon
description: Blast a cloud of birthday themed confetti cheer.

name: Connected Speaker
description: A small speaker that will play any audio from a connected Boom Box.

description: Delicious Bear Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Cooked Big Cat Meat
description: Delicious Big Cat Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

description: Cooked chicken. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Cooked Crocodile Meat
description: Delicious Crocodile Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Cooked Deer Meat
description: Cooked Deer Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Cooked Fish
description: Cooked Fish. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Cooked Horse Meat
description: Cooked Horse Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Cooked Snake Meat
description: Delicious Snake Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

description: Cooked Wolf Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

description: A vibrant flashing floor that pulses in time to music.

name: Dog Tag

name: Lumberjack Suit

name: M249

description: Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.

name: Medium Animated Neon Sign

name: Medium Chassis

name: Medium Frankenstein Legs
description: A balanced set of legs. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

name: Medium Frankenstein Torso
description: A balanced torso. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

description: Mint ID Tag

name: Modular Car Lift

name: MP5A4

name: Nailgun
description: A construction tool turned deadly.

name: Nest Hat

name: Netting

name: Nomad Suit
description: A nomad suit.

name: Note

description: A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

description: Orchid seeds can be found when picking wild Orchids.

description: A medium ornate frame

description: Raw Big Cat Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

description: Raw Crocodile Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

description: Raw Deer Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

description: Raw Fish.

description: Raw Horse Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

description: A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.
